Package http.server

Class WebServer.ClientHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • http.server.WebServer.ClientHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    WebServer
    private static class WebServer.ClientHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    ClientHandler class implements Runnable because we want our server to be able to handle multiple clients simultaneously with multithreading.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void doDELETE​(java.net.Socket client, java.lang.String filename)
      Implementation of the HTTP DELETE method according to the specifications listed on the mozilla developer docs
      private void doGET​(java.net.Socket client, java.lang.String filename)
      Given a client and a filename to access, returns to the client the content of the file if it exists or 404 otherwise.
      private void doHEAD​(java.net.Socket client, java.lang.String filename)
      Given a client and a filename to access, returns to the client the headers that a GET request would return.
      private void doOPTIONS​(java.net.Socket client, java.lang.String filename)
      Implementation of the HTTP DELETE method according to the specifications listed on the mozilla developer docs
      private void doPOST​(java.io.BufferedInputStream in, java.net.Socket client, java.lang.String filename)
      handles the POST request.
      private void doPUT​(java.io.BufferedInputStream in, java.net.Socket client, java.lang.String filename)
      Implementation of the HTTP PUT request method according to the specifications listed on the mozilla developer docs
      private static java.lang.String guessContentType​(java.nio.file.Path filePath)  
      private void handleClient​(java.net.Socket client)
      Handles the client actions once there is a client connected.
      void run()
      Function to run when our thread is started.
      private static void sendContentResponse​(java.net.Socket client, java.lang.String status, java.lang.String contentType, byte[] content, long length)
      Sends a response with a header and a body for the GET request
      private static void sendHeader​(java.net.Socket client, java.lang.String status)
      Sends a response with only a header and the response status
      private static void sendHeader​(java.net.Socket client, java.lang.String status, java.lang.String allows)
      Sends a header with the allowed http requests for the OPTIONS request
      private static void sendHeader​(java.net.Socket client, java.lang.String status, java.lang.String contentType, long length)
      Sends a header with the response status the content type and the content length for the HEAD request.
